title: Troll leather armour
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                                           | Troll Leather Armour                  |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| Size to wear                                                   | All                                   |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 3                                     |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | 4                                     |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +3                                    |
| Grants                                                         | [Regen](/Regeneration "Regeneration") |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5                                     |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A suit of armour made from the stiff and knobbly skin of a troll. It magically regenerates its wearer's flesh.***"THE TROLL KING: Now, listen, Prince Peer, and give way to reason! You're cut out for a troll. Why, look, already You bear yourself quite in a troll-like fashion! And you want to become one, don't you? PEER GYNT: Of course. In return for a bride and a well-found kingdom I'm not unwilling to sacrifice something; But all things have a natural limit. I have taken a tail, it is true; but, then, I can undo the knots that our friend has tied And take the thing off. I have shed my breeches; They were old and patched; but that won't prevent me From putting them on if I have a mind to. I shall probably find it just as easy To deal with your Trollish way of living. I can easily swear that a cow's a maiden; An oath's not a difficult thing to swallow. But to know that one never can get one's freedom – Not even to die as a human being – To end one's days as a Troll of the mountains – Never go back, as you tell me plainly – That is a thing that I'll not submit to."-Henrik Ibsen, \_Peer Gynt\_. 1867. |

**Troll leather armour** is one of the lightest [armours](/Armour "Armour"). It has the same defense and encumbrance as [leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour"), but also provides Regen+ (+0.80 HP/turn). This bonus does not apply while under [-Regen](/Inhibited_Regeneration "Inhibited Regeneration"). Note that this armour can be worn by [Trolls](/Troll "Troll"), [Oni](/Oni "Oni"), and [Spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan"), while regular leather armour cannot.

This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay any [troll](/List_of_trolls "List of trolls"). The unique trolls [Pargi](/Pargi "Pargi"), [Parghit](/Parghit "Parghit"), and [Snorg](/Snorg "Snorg") may drop hides that are already enchanted. The moon troll of [Lehudib's Moon Base](/Lehudib%27s_Moon_Base "Lehudib's Moon Base") will drop the [moon troll leather armour](/Moon_troll_leather_armour "Moon troll leather armour") (or an [artefact](/Artefact "Artefact") troll armour, if you've already found it).

## Desirability

Troll leather armour is decent for characters who need to stay unencumbered, as it is very light. The regeneration boost is equivalent to an [amulet of regeneration](/Amulet_of_regeneration "Amulet of regeneration"), which is quite strong. It is arguably better than the couple of extra AC you'd get from light [dragon scales](/Dragon_scales "Dragon scales"). In addition to the combat benefit, it lets you recover faster, reducing the chance you find a monster while resting.

In any case, TLA is a direct upgrade to [leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour"), and nearly always better than a [steam dragon scales](/Steam_dragon_scales "Steam dragon scales"). [Oni](/Oni "Oni"), [Trolls](/Troll "Troll"), and [Spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan") who have yet to find dragon scales will at least appreciate something heavier to wear.

|                                                                                         | Image                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Armour**                                                                              | [![Troll leather armour.png](/images/5/54/Troll_leather_armour.png)](/File:Troll_leather_armour.png) [![Deep troll leather armour.png](/images/e/e8/Deep_troll_leather_armour.png)](/File:Deep_troll_leather_armour.png) [![Iron troll leather armour.png](/images/e/e1/Iron_troll_leather_armour.png)](/File:Iron_troll_leather_armour.png) |
|                                                                                         | [Unrandart](/Unrandart "Unrandart") Troll leather armour                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| **[Moon troll leather armour](/Moon_troll_leather_armour "Moon troll leather armour")** | [![Moon troll leather armour.png](/images/4/47/Moon_troll_leather_armour.png)](/File:Moon_troll_leather_armour.png)                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), troll leather armour had a base AC of 4 (and max enchantment of 4).
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), the regeneration property gave +1.0 HP/turn.
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), the regeneration property gave +0.4 HP/turn.
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), all trolls, including [deep](/Deep_troll "Deep troll") and [iron trolls](/Iron_troll "Iron troll"), dropped only green armour.
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), this item could be created by using a [scroll of enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") on a [troll hide](/Troll_hide "Troll hide").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), wearing this armour increased the rate at which the player grew hungry.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), player [Trolls](/Troll "Troll") didn't get a regen bonus for wearing troll leather armour.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), troll leather armour only provided +30 regeneration rate.

| [Armour](/Armour "Armour")    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Body Armour                   | [Leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour") • [Ring mail](/Ring_mail "Ring mail") • [Scale mail](/Scale_mail "Scale mail") • [Chain mail](/Chain_mail "Chain mail") • [Plate armour](/Plate_armour "Plate armour") • [Crystal plate armour](/Crystal_plate_armour "Crystal plate armour")[Robe](/Robe "Robe") • [Animal skin](/Animal_skin "Animal skin") • [Troll leather armour]() • [Steam dragon scales](/Steam_dragon_scales "Steam dragon scales") • [Acid dragon scales](/Acid_dragon_scales "Acid dragon scales") • [Swamp dragon scales](/Swamp_dragon_scales "Swamp dragon scales") • [Quicksilver dragon scales](/Quicksilver_dragon_scales "Quicksilver dragon scales") • [Fire dragon scales](/Fire_dragon_scales "Fire dragon scales") • [Ice dragon scales](/Ice_dragon_scales "Ice dragon scales") [Pearl dragon scales](/Pearl_dragon_scales "Pearl dragon scales") • [Shadow dragon scales](/Shadow_dragon_scales "Shadow dragon scales") • [Storm dragon scales](/Storm_dragon_scales "Storm dragon scales") • [Gold dragon scales](/Gold_dragon_scales "Gold dragon scales") |
| Miscellaneous                 | [Hat](/Hat "Hat") • [Helmet](/Helmet "Helmet") • [Cloak](/Cloak "Cloak") • [Scarf](/Scarf "Scarf") • [Gloves](/Gloves "Gloves") • [Boots](/Boots "Boots") • [Barding](/Barding "Barding")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Shields](/Shields "Shields") | [Buckler](/Buckler "Buckler") • [Kite shield](/Kite_shield "Kite shield") • [Tower shield](/Tower_shield "Tower shield") • [Orb](/Orb "Orb")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
html:
Troll leather armour

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Troll Leather Armour
Size to wear All
Armour Class 3
Encumbrance rating 4
Maximum Enchantment +3
Grants Regen
Time to Wear 5


A suit of armour made from the stiff and knobbly skin of a troll. It magically regenerates its wearer's flesh.

"THE TROLL KING: Now, listen, Prince Peer, and give way to reason!
You're cut out for a troll. Why, look, already
You bear yourself quite in a troll-like fashion!
And you want to become one, don't you?
PEER GYNT: Of course.
In return for a bride and a well-found kingdom
I'm not unwilling to sacrifice something;
But all things have a natural limit.
I have taken a tail, it is true; but, then,
I can undo the knots that our friend has tied
And take the thing off. I have shed my breeches;
They were old and patched; but that won't prevent me
From putting them on if I have a mind to.
I shall probably find it just as easy
To deal with your Trollish way of living.
I can easily swear that a cow's a maiden;
An oath's not a difficult thing to swallow.
But to know that one never can get one's freedom –
Not even to die as a human being –
To end one's days as a Troll of the mountains –
Never go back, as you tell me plainly –
That is a thing that I'll not submit to."

-Henrik Ibsen, _Peer Gynt_. 1867.

Troll leather armour is one of the lightest armours. It has the same defense and encumbrance as leather armour, but also provides Regen+ (+0.80 HP/turn). This bonus does not apply while under -Regen. Note that this armour can be worn by Trolls, Oni, and Spriggans, while regular leather armour cannot.

This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay any troll. The unique trolls Pargi, Parghit, and Snorg may drop hides that are already enchanted. The moon troll of Lehudib's Moon Base will drop the moon troll leather armour (or an artefact troll armour, if you've already found it).

Desirability

Troll leather armour is decent for characters who need to stay unencumbered, as it is very light. The regeneration boost is equivalent to an amulet of regeneration, which is quite strong. It is arguably better than the couple of extra AC you'd get from light dragon scales. In addition to the combat benefit, it lets you recover faster, reducing the chance you find a monster while resting.

In any case, TLA is a direct upgrade to leather armour, and nearly always better than a steam dragon scales. Oni, Trolls, and Spriggans who have yet to find dragon scales will at least appreciate something heavier to wear.

Image
Armour
Unrandart
Troll leather armour
Moon troll leather armour

History

  • Prior to 0.31, troll leather armour had a base AC of 4 (and max enchantment of 4).
  • Prior to 0.28, the regeneration property gave +1.0 HP/turn.
  • Prior to 0.27, the regeneration property gave +0.4 HP/turn.
  • Prior to 0.20, all trolls, including deep and iron trolls, dropped only green armour.
  • Prior to 0.19, this item could be created by using a scroll of enchant armour on a troll hide.
  • Prior to 0.18, wearing this armour increased the rate at which the player grew hungry.
  • Prior to 0.17, player Trolls didn't get a regen bonus for wearing troll leather armour.
  • Prior to 0.14, troll leather armour only provided +30 regeneration rate.
Armour
Body Armour Leather armour • Ring mail • Scale mail • Chain mail • Plate armour • Crystal plate armour

Robe • Animal skin • Troll leather armour • Steam dragon scales • Acid dragon scales •
Swamp dragon scales • Quicksilver dragon scales • Fire dragon scales • Ice dragon scales
Pearl dragon scales • Shadow dragon scales • Storm dragon scales • Gold dragon scales

Miscellaneous Hat • Helmet • Cloak • Scarf • Gloves • Boots • Barding
Shields Buckler • Kite shield • Tower shield • Orb
